name: privacymagic
description: a browser extension that protects your privacy online

scripts.build: node tools/adblock-list-processor.js && npm run copy && NODE_ENV=production node esbuild.config.js && web-ext build --source-dir dist --overwrite-dest --artifacts-dir artifacts
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run copy:watch" "NODE_ENV=development node esbuild.config.js watch" "web-ext run -t chromium --source-dir dist --ignore-files _metadata _metadata/**"

author: Arthur Edelstein
